props.title: Create Single NFT
props.description: How to create a Non-Fungible token on Cardano with JavaScript.
props.body:
- In this guide we will go over how to create a [NFT](/terms/nft) on the Cardano blockchain using Javascript and the [cardano-cli-js](/terms/cardano-cli-js) package provided by our friends from BERRY stake pool [Alessandro](/identities/alessandro-berry) and [Pascal](/identities/pascal-berry).



<YoutubeVideo url="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OeOliguGn7Y" />
